src:
В сети появились первые оценки Death Stranding — средний балл игры на агрегаторах от 82 до 83
01 Nov 2019, 07:26 by Матвей Трухан



В Metacritic средняя оценка составляет 82 балла, а на Opencritic — 83.



Оценки журналистов:

We Got This Covered — 10 / 10
EGM — 10 / 10
Push Square — 10 / 10
GamingTrend — 100 / 100
Screen Rant — 10 / 10
Digitally Downloaded — 10 / 10
Glitched Africa — 10 / 10
Game Revolution — 10 / 10
PSX Brasil — 95 / 100
Gaming Nexus — 9,5 / 10
Next Gen Base — 9,5 / 10
PlayStation LifeStyle — 9.5 / 10
Geek Culture — 9,4 / 10
Spaziogames — 9,4 / 10
COGconnected — 93 / 100
Nexus — 9.2 / 10
INDIANTVCZ — 9 / 10
GamingBolt — 9 / 10
Shacknews — 9 / 10
GameSpot — 9 / 10
God is a Geek — 9 / 10
GameMAG — 9 / 10
Spiel Times — 9 / 10
Merlin'in Kazanı — 82 / 100
Saudi Gamer — 8 / 10
Press Start — 8 / 10
VideoGamer — 8 / 10
Easy Allies — 8 / 10
Destructoid — 8 / 10
Gameblog — 8 / 10
Guardian — 8 / 10
CGMagazine — 7,5 / 10
USgamer — 7 / 10
Game Informer — 7 / 10
Hardcore Gamer — 3,5 / 5
Metro GameCentral — 7 / 10
GamesRadar+ — 3,5 / 5
3DNews — 7 / 10
IGN — 6,8 / 10
VG247 — 6 / 10
AusGamers — 6 / 10
Stevivor — 3,5 / 10
PowerUp! — 3 / 10

Одни из самых низких оценок игре поставили IGN (6,8 из 10), GameInformer (7 из 10), Gamesradar+ (3,5 из 5) и VG247 (6 из 10).
Обзор DTF уже на сайте. Игра выйдет 8 ноября на PS4, а летом 2020 года появится на ПК.



Материал дополнен редакцией
text:
The first estimates of Death Stranding appeared on the network - the average score of the game on aggregators from 82 to 83
01 Nov 2019, 07:26 by Matvey Trukhan



In Metacritic, the average score is 82 points, and in Opencritic - 83.



Journalists' ratings:

We Got This Covered - 10/10
EGM - 10/10
Push Square - 10/10
GamingTrend - 100/100
Screen Rant - 10/10
Digitally Downloaded - 10/10
Glitched Africa - 10/10
Game Revolution - 10/10
PSX Brasil - 95/100
Gaming Nexus - 9.5 / 10
Next Gen Base - 9.5 / 10
PlayStation LifeStyle - 9.5 / 10
Geek Culture - 9.4 / 10
Spaziogames - 9.4 / 10
COGconnected - 93/100
Nexus - 9.2 / 10
INDIANTVCZ - 9/10
GamingBolt - 9/10
Shacknews - 9/10
GameSpot - 9/10
God is a Geek - 9/10
GameMAG - 9/10
Spiel Times - 9/10
Merlin'in Kazanı - 82/100
Saudi Gamer - 8/10
Press Start - 8/10
VideoGamer - 8/10
Easy Allies - 8/10
Destructoid - 8/10
Gameblog - 8/10
Guardian - 8/10
CGMagazine - 7.5 / 10
USgamer - 7/10
Game Informer - 7/10
Hardcore Gamer - 3.5 / 5
Metro GameCentral - 7/10
GamesRadar + - 3.5 / 5
3DNews - 7/10
IGN - 6.8 / 10
VG247 - 6/10
AusGamers - 6/10
Stevivor - 3.5 / 10
PowerUp! - 3/10

IGN (6.8 out of 10), GameInformer (7 out of 10), Gamesradar + (3.5 out of 5) and VG247 (6 out of 10) put some of the lowest ratings for the game.
DTF review is already on the site. The game will be released on November 8 on the PS4, and in the summer of 2020 will appear on the PC.



The material is supplemented by the editors.
